alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:04AM EST until January 03 at 8:15AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SIMPSON...WESTERN ALLEN AND SOUTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 704 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Scottsville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scottsville, Allen Springs, Black Jack, West Fork, Clare, Geddes, Settle, Yesse, Mcelroy Ford and Raley Ford. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for south central Kentucky. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
